page.title: 06My Bedroom
page.content: My favourite room is upstairs.It is my bedroom.There is a wooden door covered with stickers.Open the door and find a yellow carpet on the floor and blue and white striped wallpaper like the strip of my best football team - Leicester.Near the window is my bed,next to the drawers and a bookshelf.A black and white TV is on the side on a worktop and next to it is the cupboard.The cupboard has shelves on one side and on the other a bar where I hang my jumpers,shirts and track suits.When I am sent upstairs to tidy my room I switch on the TV,push all my clothes under the bed and watch any programme. My bed is really soft.The duvet cover has stripes in green,blue,red,yellow - the same as the curtains.A red lamp is next to my bed.
